body:
Comment 2 by **lost.goblin**: 
In my not very humble opinion: this is not a bug, it is a feature, BoMs are garbage and
should be treated as such.

> It should support BOM because many editors like Notepad + textWrangler insert the BOM.

Those editors should stop adding garbage to text files, report a bug to their respective
authors or find a text editor that doesn't corrupt files.

That said, maybe the braindamage caused by such ineptly conceived programs has become
too great and the Go authors have to carve in to the pressure from such idioticy, but it
would be very sad...
